page.title: 07Farming
page.content: {Type: }all mixed arable. {Size: }one under 50 hectares,the rest are 150+ hectares. {Main crops: }Winter and Spring barley; Winter wheat;Oats;Fodder-turnips and kale; potatoes; Oil-seedrape; Grass- hay,silage and grazing; and protein peas. {Main livestock: }Cattle-breeding and fattening; Sheep-fattening and rearing ;and horses. {Markets:}Cupar, Perth, Stirling. {Use of grain:}Malting and Feeding. {Use of potatoes: }Seed and ware. In the past ten years there have been major changes in agriculture. Crops that formerly were sown in spring now are put in the ground in early autumn as they are winter hardy. The yellow flowers that you see as you drive through the country side in May is a new crop Oil-seed rape.
